A1.name: A1-CRITICAL (Ultra-High Frequency)

tokens.name: AtomicFactTT
tokens.definition: Simple, indivisible factual claims - basic statements

tokens.name: ConditionalTT
tokens.definition: True under stated conditions or assumptions

tokens.name: EthicalTT
tokens.definition: Normative claims grounded in ethical principles

A1.description: Single-word patterns with ultra-common words (is, are, when, how, etc.)

tokens.name: EmotionalTruthTT
tokens.definition: Felt/affective claims tied to human states - universal emotions

tokens.name: MetaSystemTT
tokens.definition: Statements about AI system behavior, capabilities, or status

tokens.name: MetaBugTT
tokens.definition: Reports of system bugs, errors, or malfunctions

tokens.name: MetaLoopTT
tokens.definition: Infinite loops, repetition, or stuck behavior

tokens.name: MetaPerformanceTT
tokens.definition: System performance, speed, or efficiency queries

tokens.name: MetaErrorTT
tokens.definition: Error messages, debugging requests, or troubleshooting

tokens.name: MetaStatusTT
tokens.definition: System status, health, or operational state

tokens.name: UniversalTT
tokens.definition: Objective facts independent of context - universally true

tokens.name: LogicalTT
tokens.definition: Truths derived from pure logic and reasoning

tokens.name: DataTT
tokens.definition: Measurements and observations with units and methods

tokens.name: ProbabilisticTT
tokens.definition: Uncertainty expressed as likelihoods - foundational probability

tokens.name: CulturalTT
tokens.definition: Shared norms/meanings within a community - universal cultural facts

tokens.name: StatisticalTT
tokens.definition: Based on statistical analysis and data

tokens.name: ObservationalTT
tokens.definition: Based on direct observation or witnessing

tokens.name: PeerReviewedTT
tokens.definition: Vetted by expert review and publication

tokens.name: TestimonialTT
tokens.definition: Based on witness testimony or accounts

tokens.name: DomainSpecificTT
tokens.definition: True within a particular field or discipline

tokens.name: TechnicalTT
tokens.definition: True in technical or engineering contexts

tokens.name: StandardTT
tokens.definition: True per industry or technical standard

tokens.name: ContractualTT
tokens.definition: True per contract terms and agreements

tokens.name: HistoricalTT
tokens.definition: True about past events - scientific/historical domain knowledge

tokens.name: BiologicalTT
tokens.definition: True about living organisms and biology

tokens.name: SeasonalTT
tokens.definition: True for specific seasons or periods

tokens.name: EventHistoryTT
tokens.definition: Historical events - wars, battles, treaties, discoveries, founding events

tokens.name: InfrastructureHistoryTT
tokens.definition: Historical infrastructure - railroads, bridges, canals, buildings, roads

tokens.name: IndustryHistoryTT
tokens.definition: Industrial and economic history - manufacturing, trade, commerce

tokens.name: TransportHistoryTT
tokens.definition: Transportation history - freight, shipping, aviation, maritime, transit

tokens.name: LegacyTT
tokens.definition: Historical legacy and heritage - traditions, lineage

tokens.name: ConsensusTT
tokens.definition: Agreed upon by experts/community - probabilistic consensus

tokens.name: PoliticalTT
tokens.definition: True within political context - probabilistic political claims

tokens.name: ReligiousTT
tokens.definition: True within religious framework - probabilistic religious

B1.name: B1-HIGH (Mixed - Ultra High Freq)
B1.description: Mixed patterns containing ultra-common single words
B1.impact: Removes single-word patterns from mixed tokens

B2.name: B2-HIGH (Mixed - Other)

tokens.name: MetaHallucinationTT
tokens.definition: AI hallucinations, confabulation, or false generation

tokens.name: MetaSelfReferentialTT
tokens.definition: Self-referential AI content or queries about AI itself

tokens.name: MetaCapabilityTT
tokens.definition: Queries about AI capabilities, tools, or functions

tokens.name: RelationalTT
tokens.definition: Truths only via relations (X related-to Y)

tokens.name: LegalTT
tokens.definition: True under legal frameworks and statutes

tokens.name: CurrentTT
tokens.definition: True as of now - present state

tokens.name: RegionalHistoryTT
tokens.definition: Local and regional history - states, cities, counties, territories

tokens.name: InstitutionHistoryTT
tokens.definition: Institutional history - companies, organizations, governments, universities

tokens.name: EraPatternTT
tokens.definition: Historical eras and periods - centuries, decades, ages

tokens.name: OriginHistoryTT
tokens.definition: Origins and beginnings - how things started

tokens.name: ExpertOpinionTT
tokens.definition: Opinion from qualified experts - probabilistic expert view

tokens.name: AnecdotalTT
tokens.definition: Based on personal stories - probabilistic anecdote

tokens.name: SocialMediaTT
tokens.definition: From social platforms - probabilistic social media

tokens.name: TranslationTT
tokens.definition: Claims about translation accuracy or meaning across languages

tokens.name: RecursiveTT
tokens.definition: Recursive self-reference that cannot be resolved

B2.description: Mixed patterns with other single words

C.name: C-LOW (Already Correct)

tokens.name: MetaQueryTT
tokens.definition: Queries about how the system works or responds

tokens.name: DatePatternTT
tokens.definition: Historical date references - years, specific dates

tokens.name: InfiniteTT
tokens.definition: Infinite regress, infinite loops in reasoning

C.description: Multi-word patterns only - validate and refine
